alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Mifflin; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 4:01AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF HUNTINGDON...MIFFLIN... AND SOUTHERN CENTRE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A brief period of heavy snow causing slippery roads. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 356 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was near Lewistown moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Seven Mountains, Whipple Dam State Park, Boalsburg, Burnham, Milroy, Highland Park, Yeagertown, Reedsville, Alfarata, Mcalevys Fort, Potters Mills, Reeds Gap State Park, Barrville, Siglerville, Tussey Mountain Ski Area, and Pennsylvania Military Museum. This includes the following highways... Route 322 from Boalsburg to Lewistown, including Seven Mountains. Route 522 from east of Lewistown to Alfarata. State Road 45 near Boalsburg. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if traveling through this area. Potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
